name: collapsetable
description: CollapseTable: lightweight, dependency-free JS to make HTML tables responsive by collapsing overflow columns into per-row details (+/âˆ’ toggle).
author: Vishnu (Codes Easy) <https://vishnu.wiki> (https://www.codeseasy.com)

scripts.build: npm run clean && cpy src/CollapseTable.js dist --rename=collapsetable.js --flat && terser dist/collapsetable.js --compress --mangle --source-map content=inline,url=collapsetable.min.js.map -o dist/collapsetable.min.js
